title: Drunk on duty; sleeping on post; leaving post before relief
context: [ยง124A-146] Drunk on duty; sleeping on post; leaving post before relief. Any person subject to this chapter who is found drunk on duty or sleeping upon the person&rsquo;s post, or who leaves the person&rsquo;s post before the person is regularly relieved, shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985]
